variable.name: ST2_00

variable.name: MSA_00
variable.description: Median nerve - sensory response amplitude (μv): baseline

variable.name: SA_00
variable.description: Sural nerve - response amplitude (μv): baseline

variable.name: SYMPT_00
variable.description: Symptoms of neuropathy: baseline - Note: The dataset codebook supplies values of 0=absent;1=present (PDF page 4; document page 2); the dataset contains values of 1 and 2. Based on examination of data, we presume 1 = NO, and 2 = Yes because 90% of sample is coded 1 and only 10% is coded 2 for neuropathy symptoms.

variable.name: SIGNS_00
variable.description: Sensory signs of neuropathy: baseline - Note: The dataset codebook supplies values of 0=absent;1=present (PDF page 4; document page 2); the dataset contains values of 1 and 2. Based on examination of data, we presume 1 = NO, and 2 = Yes because 90% of sample is coded 1 and only 10% is coded 2 for neuropathy symptoms.

variable.name: REFLX_00
variable.description: Decreased deep-tendon reflexes: baseline - Note: The dataset codebook supplies values of 0=absent;1=present (PDF page 4; document page 2); the dataset contains values of 1 and 2. Based on examination of data, we presume 1 = NO, and 2 = Yes because 90% of sample is coded 1 and only 10% is coded 2 for neuropathy symptoms.

variable.name: NDIAG_00
variable.description: Neuropathy (clinical diagnosis): baseline

variable.name: VELS_00
variable.description: One or more reduced nerve conduction velocities: baseline

variable.name: AMPS_00
variable.description: At least one reduced response amplitude: baseline

variable.name: FWAVES00
variable.description: One or more prolonged F-wave latencies: baseline

variable.name: ABSENT00
variable.description: At least one unelicitable response: baseline

variable.name: MM_ABN00
variable.description: Median nerve - motor - conduction abnormality: baseline

variable.name: MS_ABN00
variable.description: Median nerve - sensory - conduction abnormality: baseline

variable.name: P_ABN00
variable.description: Peroneal nerve - conduction abnormality: baseline

variable.name: S_ABN00
variable.description: Sural nerve - conduction abnormality: baseline

variable.name: NC_ABN00
variable.description: Conduction abnormality in 2 or more nerves: baseline

variable.name: ABN_1_00
variable.description: Conduction abnormality in 1 or more nerve(s): baseline

variable.name: FOLLOWUP
variable.description: Length of follow-up time (coded 1 through 4)

variable.name: AGEGROUP
variable.description: Patient's age group (years): < 20 = 1, 20-29 = 2, 30+ = 3

variable.name: NDEF_00
variable.description: Neuropathy (analytic definition, 1=y): baseline - Note: The definite/possible/coding from the codebook appears not to have been applied; codes of 1=Yes, 0=No, are likely to be the correct ones.

variable.name: DUR5
variable.description: IDDM Duration >= 5 years

variable.name: HEIGHT
variable.description: Patient's height

variable.name: SMOKES
variable.description: Patient's smoking status

variable.name: DRINKS
variable.description: Alcohol user at baseline

variable.name: HBAEL
variable.description: Hemoglobin A1c at eligibility

variable.name: LDL_NCEP
variable.description: Baseline LDL value (National Cholesterol Education Program [NCEP] category)
variable.value: MORE THAN OR EQUAL TO 160 MG/DL

variable.name: OB_ANS
variable.description: O'Brien score: baseline - ANS

variable.name: OB_NC
variable.description: O'Brien score: baseline - nerve conduction velocity

variable.name: ANS_QRTL
variable.description: Quartile of O'Brien score: baseline ANS

variable.name: EMG_QRTL
variable.description: Quartile of O'Brien score: baseline EMG

variable.name: HBA_QRTL
variable.description: Quartile of HbA1c at baseline

variable.name: BMIGROUP
variable.description: Is patient's BMI below or above gender median

variable.name: HGTGROUP
variable.description: Is patient's height below or above gender median

Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: SD_20
variable.description: Sural nerve - test distance (mm): quarterly visit 20

variable.name: SV_20
variable.description: Sural nerve - conduction velocity (m/sec): quarterly visit 20 - Note: As reported in the NeuropathyCodebook (phd000387) the original data show three coding options (.G, .B, .L) which were not properly translated from the original SAS file; instead each of these coded values appears as '.' value in the dataset available through dbGaP.
variable.value: Gain (unelicitable at baseline but not at follow-up) of function
Loss (elicitable at baseline but unelicitable at follow-up)

variable.name: ST2_20
variable.description: Sural nerve - post-test temperature (celsius): quarterly visit 20 - Note: There may be instances of errors in recording some body temperatures values. Body temperature values outside reasonable ranges (e.g., 30-40 degrees celsius) might be treated as recording or measurement errors.

variable.name: MMV_C04
variable.description: Change in median nerve - motor - conduction velocity: quarterly visit 04 - Note: As reported in the NeuropathyCodebook (phd000387) the original data show three coding options (.G, .B, .L) which were not properly translated from the original SAS file; instead each of these coded values appears as '.' value in the dataset available through dbGaP.
variable.value: Gain (unelicitable at baseline but not at follow-up) of function
Loss (elicitable at baseline but unelicitable at follow-up)
